Pre-Game Insights: The match is between the top two teams of the ICC Men's ODI World Cup 2023, India and South Africa, at Eden Gardens, Kolkata.
India has an unbeaten record in the tournament, while South Africa has a strong Net Run Rate (NRR) of +2.290.
Virat Kohli will celebrate his 35th birthday during the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch is expected to be balanced, favoring both batsmen and bowlers.
Live streaming options include Disney+ Hotstar and Star Sports Network.
